analysis.description:
ICO.terminateICO (/unique_chucks/24/0x23d93e7482c98351a4f5cb777b445c72f915d116.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(ELYC.balanceOf(address(this)) == 0)

ICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0x23d93e7482c98351a4f5cb777b445c72f915d116.sol#196-210) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ELYC.transfer(_investor,msg.value.mul(getRate())) (/unique_chucks/24/0x23d93e7482c98351a4f5cb777b445c72f915d116.sol#198-199)

ICO.withdrawAnyERC20 (/unique_chucks/24/0x23d93e7482c98351a4f5cb777b445c72f915d116.sol#217-222) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_recipient,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/24/0x23d93e7482c98351a4f5cb777b445c72f915d116.sol#221-222)

ICO.withdrawELYC (/unique_chucks/24/0x23d93e7482c98351a4f5cb777b445c72f915d116.sol#233-240) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ELYC.transfer(_recipient,_value) (/unique_chucks/24/0x23d93e7482c98351a4f5cb777b445c72f915d116.sol#237)

ERC20Basic.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0x23d93e7482c98351a4f5cb777b445c72f915d116.sol#94-95)
ERC20Basic.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/24/0x23d93e7482c98351a4f5cb777b445c72f915d116.sol#94)
